channel.title: docker-compose on foxlesbiao
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on foxlesbiao

item.title: Fedord install docker
item.description:
install

sudo dnf -y install dnf-plugins-core
sudo dnf config-manager \
 --add-repo \
 https://download.docker.com/linux/fedora/docker-ce.repo
sudo dnf install containerd.io docker-compose-plugin docker-compose
sudo systemctl start docker
docker -v
docker-compose -v

User Groups

sudo groupadd docker
sudo usermod -aG docker alicefox
newgrp docker
